name: Fee simple or lesser estate may be acquired
text:
In the taking of private property for a public use, a fee simple estate or any lesser estate may be acquired. [L 1896, c 45, §2; RL 1925, §810; RL 1935, §52; RL 1945, §303; am L 1951, c 12, §1(d); RL 1955, §8-5; HRS ]  Case Notes

  Condemning a fee simple estate subject to existing tenancy.  42 H. 415.
  Undivided interests in parcels of land owned in fee simple are fee simple estates and may be taken in eminent domain proceedings.  50 H. 501, 443 P.2d 140.
